column1: Cancer treatments can keep cancer from spreading and even cure early stage cancer for many people.
Some people live for years with advanced cancer.
Instead of curing cancer, treatment may help relieve symptoms and control cancer.
When standard treatments no longer work for your cancer, you still have some choices about what type of care you would like to get.
This is treatment that helps prevent and treat symptoms and side effects from cancer.
You may decide to choose hospice care if you are no longer seeking active treatment for your cancer.
Hospice care aims to improve your symptoms and help you feel comfortable in the last months of life.
